method: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, capers, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, mix together the milk, melted butter, vanilla extract, and eggs.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a griddle or non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup portions of batter onto the griddle and spread into a circle.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve the pancakes warm with your favorite toppings.
